description: Aerosol optical profiles (extinction and backscatter coefficients, particle depolarization ratio) and aerosol and cloud optical depth from CALIPSO. Pure dust products (extinction and backscatter coefficient, mass concentration, cloud relevant number concentrations) based on Marinou et al. ACP (2017), Marinou et al. ACP (2019) and Ansmann et al., AMT (2019). The products are provided for all CALIPSO overpasses, using the CALIPSO L2 aerosol product horizontal resolution of 5km. All products are clustered and averaged per overpass in 1x1 degree grid.
title: Aerosol (and dust aerosol) optical property profiles_Pure Dust concentration profiles_cloud-relevant dust number concentrations profiles_Global_CALIPSO
osc:project: Lidar Climatology of Vertical Aerosol Structure for Space-Based Lidar Simulation Studies-LIVAS
